channel.title: Referee kills player, spectators kill referee
channel.description:
[quote] According to reports, the referee was tied up, beaten, stoned and quartered. They then put his head on a stake and planted it in the middle of the pitch. [/quote] [url]https://uk.eurosport.yahoo.com/news/south-american-football-referee-beheaded-fans-killing-player-084120459.html[/url]
How can you say sports aren't interesting?

item.title: Referee kills player, spectators kill referee
item.dc:creator: OldDirtyBastard
item.description:
It’s not like it’s the first time that south american football referee was killed or beaten up by the fans/footballers. Just saying.

Read full topic
item.source: Referee kills player, spectators kill referee

item.title: Referee kills player, spectators kill referee
item.dc:creator: Pyroclase
item.description:
Ibanez:

jesus fuck, what is this, the crusades? a pike? seriously?

They said he was quartered, too. That entails cutting his entire body into four different pieces.

Read full topic
item.source: Referee kills player, spectators kill referee

item.title: Referee kills player, spectators kill referee
item.dc:creator: GilCMassey
item.description:
Orpheon:

That’s insane. Like literally insane. I cannot imagine even witnessing something like that, let alone carrying it out. I mean, I could maybe understand someone killing the referee in revenge, but what sort of evil, demented spirit has to possess you for you to torture and dismember another human like that? This sickens me.

The spirit of their countries sport: Futbol. That is what controlled them.

Read full topic
item.source: Referee kills player, spectators kill referee

item.title: Referee kills player, spectators kill referee
item.dc:creator: Ramirezoid
item.description:
when humans get rowdied up into a crowd, where the odds of getting pinned for crimes on an individual basis are next to none, and all the primal KILL AND FIT IN chemicals rear their gorgeous heads, this is what goes down.

Don’t try to turn it into a strictly south American thing. Looking at you,
Canadian Hockey Fans
English Young Adults
several bits of Africa

Also the narcos don’t just torment eachother.
They kill everyone from innocent men and women to tourists and their pets.
Their goal is to make everyone know that they are at the mercy of whoever’s in charge that week

Read full topic

item.title: Referee kills player, spectators kill referee
item.dc:creator: GilCMassey
item.description:
Pyro:

Nobody is saying that. Either way, it’s completely disproportionate violence for an amateur soccer match.

It’s a little over the top for anything short of a leader of a country mass murdering millions and getting dragged out to have this done to them. He knifed a guy and ended up renacting the final scene of Braveheart, hold the nobility and honor. Over soccer. Of all things.

Read full topic
